content.description: Heavy duty hydraulic cylinders are provided.
Parallel and smooth operations of platens with emergency stop controls.

Machine suitable for pressing laminate/veneer on wood/ply/MDF etc.
The Platens of The Press are of Solid Steel Plate duty Machined & Ground.
The heating medium is thermic fluid oil ensuring even and stable heating of the platen throughout to take care of thermal distortion.
Rigid construction to take care of thermal distortion.
Suitable for Pressing & Laminating. Lamination sheets on MDF/HPF Plywood etc
Can be provided with PLC control for automatic post forming cycle with variable heating time, stop and start time and holding time & It can be adjusted according to profiles.

Three top pneumatic cylinders provided for better holding of work pieces.
Ground and hard chrome platted heater bar for smooth operations and long life.
Drive motor is provided with brake to avoid Slippage of heating bar

content.description: Suitable for woodworking products finishing, polishing, and waxing.
Inverter control stepless revert working table, suitable for different finishing board polishing and waxing.
Inductive switch controlled revert length for more efficiency.
Movable clamping, easy to fasten workpiece.
Vacuum Table ensures effective polishing of small boards.

It has pneumatic shaft to fix film roll which is quick and solid. The electromagnetic tension system can control the tension quickly and conveniently. It is equipped with film roll moving system which can move the film roll in place and avoid film wrinkling without stopping the machine, so it can improve the working efficiency and quality of products.
It is convenient, quick, economic and labor-saving to use the electric hoist to lift the film roll group.
It covers the functions of feeding, dust cleaning, glue spreading, paper sticking, paper cutting, cold press and hot press. The product is finished for once.

The upper press rollers rise pneumatically and it is suitable for sticking material such as PVC and decorative paper with different thickness on the surface of basic material with different thickness.
Advanced digital full-automaic technology and easy to operate.
Variable feed steeples speed, efficiency is much higher than the similar products.
